description:
With this app you can:
 download and upload files to web filesharing service from Phone, Touchpad or PC
- share files to other people
- photo gallery available (if you upload photos, it will create photo gallery
- possibility to set upload and download password
- master password for deleting files and managing passwords
versionNote:
For proper function you need web server. You only need to copy PHP scripts to web server via FTP and set privileges for upload dir. Next you will set master password. In app you will set upload address and master password in settings and now it's successfully configured.
The server-side code has been archived and is available at https://github.com/codepoet80/synoupload
